page.title: 14YOUTH ACTIVITIES IN BEDFORD
page.content: My dad is the youth leader at{ {Brickhill Baptist Church.}During the year he organises and goes on trips with the young people. As dad is the leader, me and my sister can go on the trips as well. Last year we went to a place called Letton Hall. It was great fun mucking about with the older kids. A while ago we went to Blackpool for a weekend. That was fun too. The young people don't just go on trips, they play games in{Bedford {Park,}like rounders and American football. The reason it is so much fun is because the older kids treat me and my sister like kids of their own age and not like little babies like some teenagers do with kids a lot younger than themselves.
